Daniiesc's Scorpion skill rotation guide for bosses

Off-hand guide below!

General

Always use dagger (faster, higher dmg basic attacks) as main hand weapon, unless mech needs you to keep distance from the boss, swap to xbow main hand for that period

Use Umbral Spirit for Bellandir xbow, Thunder Spirit for any other xbow

Use Cleaving Moonlight only once, to get the attack speed buff while Consecutive Use is active

Within the duration of Selfless Diffusion always watch if your first Detonation Mark has 2 stacks or not, if not try to use Detonation Mark ASAP to have the 2 stacks

Within the duration of Selfless Diffusion the goal is to use Thundering Bomb on 20 Thunderclouds stacks AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE

Try to use Mana Exchange whenever it's up to sustain mana consumption

Keep Mother Nature's Protest always on, watch out to turn it back on if your mana drops so low that it turns off automatically

Use Weak Point Shot whenever the boss does Fury or Wrath attack (when you need to block or roll). To get the buff, use it before OR right after the block (if you are close to the boss). Try to position yourself to the back of the boss, to have 24% crit dmg instead of 21%.

In my opinion using Nimble Leap is not worth regardless the extra crit dmg buff for a short duration. Nimble Leap cancelling all melee autos in the meantime (talkin about milliseconds) which will cause noticeable worse cooldowns while Selfless Diffusion is active.

Mastery skills:

Within the duration of Selfless Diffusion

Use buffs: Lightning Infusion > Umbral Spirit/Thunder Spirit > Selfless Diffusion

Keep the Cleaving Moonlight Consecutive Use activated

Use Quick Fire to stack up Thunderclouds

Use Thundering Bomb when you have 20 Thundercloud stacks

Use Knife Throwing to reduce your cooldowns

Lightning Infusion > Umbral Spirit/Thunder Spirit > Selfless Diffusion > Fatal Stigma > Detonation Mark > Cleaving Moonlight > Quick Fire > Lightning Infusion > Thundering Bomb > Knife Throwing > Quick Fire > Thundering Bomb > Cleaving Moonlight > Quick Fire > Thundering Bomb > Knife Throwing > Quick Fire > Thundering Bomb

When Selfless Diffusion cooldown is higher than 5 sec

When Selfless Diffusion cooldown is LESS than 5 sec, DO NOT use Knife Throwing

Don't use Umbral Spirit/Thunder Spirit

Use Lightning Infusion

Use Detonation Mark only if your Thundering Bomb is NOT on cooldown

Prioritize Thundering Bomb usage on Detonation Mark

Keep the Cleaving Moonlight Consecutive Use activated

Use Quick Fire to stack up Thunderclouds after using Thundering Bomb

Use Thundering Bomb when you have 20 Thundercloud stacks

Lightning Infusion > Fatal Stigma > Detonation Mark > Cleaving Moonlight > Quick Fire > Thundering Bomb

Updated Rotation Note (Ankle Strike over Fatal Stigma)

A more optimized rotation replaces Fatal Stigma with Ankle Strike. With specialization, casting Ankle Strike grants off-hand attack chance. If Ankle Strike procs an off-hand hit, it applies the buff a second time, effectively doubling the off-hand attack chance coming from Ankle Strike for a short duration.

This pairs extremely well with Selfless Diffusion and Off-hand Frenzy (after using Cleaving Moonlight), since more off-hand procs = faster cooldowns.

With an off-hand-focused build, you can reach 95.58% off-hand attack chance for a short window.

Keep in mind, it is hard to maintain the high off-hand attack chance due to short duration of buffs.

  • Ankle Strike buff: 3s

  • Off-hand Frenzy: 2s

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If you use low-impact skills during this short window, your DPS may drop below what you would get using Fatal Stigma.
